snippet: LANDESMAN--Jacob S. Congregation Emanu-El of the City of New York records with deep sorrow the death of our cherished member, Jacob Landesman. To his family and loved ones we express our profound sympathy. May beautiful memories of his life endure...
lead_paragraph: LANDESMAN--Jacob S. Congregation Emanu-El of the City of New York records with deep sorrow the death of our cherished member, Jacob Landesman. To his family and loved ones we express our profound sympathy. May beautiful memories of his life endure forever. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  LANDESMAN, JACOB S
